https://tmrev.io/movie/397159-After The Fire - Live at the Greenbelt 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null After performing at the legendary Greenbelt Arts Festival in 1979, After The Fire return 25 years later marking their return with this live performance. Originally filmed as a private recording of the event, they decided to release the show on DVD. After The Fire - Live at the Greenbelt
